metadata.name: PSExec and WMI Process Creations Block
metadata.comment: Detects blocking of process creations originating from PSExec and WMI commands

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND metadata.event_code = 1121 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmiprvse.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\psexesvc.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects blocking of process creations originating from PSExec and WMI commands
